divs: sighting detailswe were at a concert at saratoga performing arts center. once it ended we walked through some trails and came out into one of the fields\parking lots. i noticed a strange orange glow in the sky. at first i thought it was a street light or something like that. but then i noticed it was in the sky and not attached to anything. as it moved slowly i got the attention of a few other people in the field who then began to record it on their cell phones. the object moved slowly across the sky and then stopped dead in its tracks and hovered in the sky for 30 seconds or so. then, it slowly became smaller and smaller (as if it were going away from us) until a bright white light flashed and the orange glow was gone. other people were able to get this on camera but i have not been able to find them yet.
